title: We May Be Alike
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Ayumu-san, you’re becoming a more and more wonderful school idol. Every time I hear your new song, it’s like “Waah!” and I feel like I want to run around<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeeh!? To get that from you, Hanayo-chan.... The μ’s and Aqours joint live was the beginning for me, so it’s somewhat like.... a dream come true<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>μ’s and Aqours both really put their all on that joint live, right. Even now, when I play the video back, I think that they were really amazing<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Umm.... You were amazing too, you know, Hanayo-chan? You were also sparkling on that stage, and the thrill reached that person and me, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>T-, that’s.... You think too highly of me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>You also think too highly of me, though, Hanayo-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>....Ehehe<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Somehow, we may be somewhat similar, huh, Ayumu-san.... Even though we’re happy to get compliments, we get embarrassed by them....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That may be true.... When we receive compliments, it should be better if we say “Thank you” instead. Thank you for the compliment, Hanayo-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Me too! Thank you for the compliment, Ayumu-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
